q: TV judge Simon Cowell have a great deal in common. Simon Cowell has judged American Idol and The X Factor, and is renowned for being open and honest with singers he thinks aren't up to scratch. I think Sue Sylvester has British in her. I think the US look at the British as a race that tells it how it is. And if ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her, she told British newspaper The Sun. "He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Just like him, she says

Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. "( Allen Iverson ) will not be able to return to professional basketball for some six to eight weeks or more this season," Andrews said in a statement sent out by Allen Iverson 's manager, Gary Moore . At this point, it is certainly more important to get his calf healed and asymptomatic than it is to try to play with continued pain. We anticipate a full recovery and certainly anticipate him being able to resume a normal basketball career. Commenting on these changes, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Larry said: " Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google Inc. for the last decade. The results speak for themselves.
